title: Major
desc: A minimum of 20.00 credits is required, including:
footnotes: Note: FRHD*3250 Practicum I: Youth, FRHD*3290 Practicum I: Adult may be taken in either Semester 5 or Semester 6

title: Restricted Electives
desc: In addition to the 11.00 required credits, an additional 1.50 restricted electives are required in total from any of the courses listed in the restricted electives content areas (can be from one or more areas).

title: Restricted Electives Content Area 1: Adult Development & Gerontology
Restricted Electives Content Area 2: Sexuality & Relationships
Restricted Electives Content Area 3: Youth Studies
